description: User completes signup flow via Google OAuth - critical conversion event
User signs in successfully - engagement tracking
User creates a new form - activation metric
User publishes a form - key activation/conversion event
Form receives a submission - core value metric (server-side)
User starts their 14-day free trial - funnel event (server-side)
User initiates payment checkout - conversion funnel (server-side)
Payment successful and subscription active - revenue event (server-side webhook)
User cancels subscription - churn event (server-side webhook)
User connects Google account with Sheets/Calendar permissions
User clicks CTA on pricing section - conversion intent
User opens the form editor - engagement tracking
